thread.section_title: musicMagpie Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.musicmagpie.co.uk | 22 of 1292
thread.title: adil

author: adil
title: adil
text:
I don't usually write reviews but I have to make an exception. I was selling my phone to music magpie. At first it was smooth setting up account and sending phone over..
They recieved item said it was damaged abd i declined the offer..
Now the problems begin. They basically said they would return my item. Ok so i wait and wait..no reply..i contact them on twitter and email with responses ranging from 2 days to 5 days..
They have said they are chasing royal mail and it has been over a month and i habe still kt recieved an outcome.
Be warned they take ages to reply to emails or twitter..i will not use them again and not recommend to friends or family..
